title: LibGuides: Nursing: Nursing 417

description: Links to library resources for Nursing students.
cleaned_text: The material below is either open access material, material accessible via a Golden Library database subscription, or is password-protected in the electronic reserves system. If you click on a title and you are asked to login, follow these guidelines: The copyright law of the United States (Title 17, US Code) governs the making of photocopies or other reproductions of copyrighted materials. Under certain conditions specified in the law, libraries are authorized to furnish a photocopy or other reproduction. One of these conditions, fair use, specifies that the photocopy or reproduction is to be used only for private study, scholarship, or research. If a user makes a request for, or later uses, a photocopy or reproduction for purposes in excess of fair use, that user may be liable for copyright infringement.
